title: DDFP 397: Week 7 preview & Kyle Rudolph
itunes:title: DDFP 397: Week 7 preview & Kyle Rudolph
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Elliot Harrison to make their Week 7 picks during the “Red Challenge Flag Picks” segment. Plus, Shek interviews Kyle Rudolph about his love of donuts, famous people named “Rudolph,” and his prediction for the upcoming Vikings vs. Lions matchup.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
